scripts.content: window,function(){const t=new Set,e=()=>{document.querySelectorAll(".scroll_fade_section").forEach(e=>t.add(e))};new MutationObserver(e).observe(document.body,{childList:!0,subtree:!0}),e();let n=!1;function o(){n||(requestAnimationFrame(i),n=!0)}function i(){const e=window.innerHeight;t.forEach(t=>{const n=t.getBoundingClientRect();if(n.bottom<0||n.top>e)return;const o=e,i=-n.height;let s=(n.top-o)/(i-o);s=Math.min(Math.max(s,0),1);const r=s<=.5?1:1-(s-.5)/.5,a=130+-260*s;t.style.transform=`translateY(${a}px)`,t.style.opacity=`${r}`,t.style.willChange="transform, opacity"}),n=!1}window.addEventListener("scroll",o,{passive:!0}),window.addEventListener("resize",o),o()}();
